name: Love Brawl
description:
Love Brawl takes you into a world where strength gives you prestige and fame.  You get an invitation to the secret Spicy Chicken club, where you get the chance to fight and prove yourself to be a worthy partner. 

Will you be able to win over your flaming hot demon crush's heart?

This game is a semester project of four Animation & Game students
(Disclaimer: The local VS mode is unpolished)

Available 12th july 2021 for Windows
